quote: Do something today your future self will thank you for.
author: Sean Patrick Flanery

quote: Every day may not be good... but there is something good in every day
author: Alice Morse Earl

quote: Your journey will be much lighter and easier if you don't carry your past with you
author: Dr. Nancy J Taylor

quote: The only time you should ever look back is to see how far you've come
author: Kim SeokJin

quote: The days that break you are the days that make you.
author: Unknown

quote: Let your fear of failure be your motivation to succeed
author: Unknown

quote: Never say you can't do something, if you say you can't, it means you didn't try hard enough
author: Donald Eugene Long Sr.

quote: Nothing is Impossible. The word itself says, I'm possible!
author: Audrey Hepburn

quote: Life is a circle of happiness, sadness, hard times, and good times. If you are going through hard times, have faith that good times are on the way.
author: Unknown

quote: It is never too late to be what you might have been
author: George Eliot
